abstract: There are two new products added to Apple’s line, both at $499: An iPhone with 16 gigabytes of memory and an iPod Touch with 32 gigabytes of memory. This sets the stage for the price cuts later this year.
snippet: There are two new products added to Apple’s line, both at $499: An iPhone with 16 gigabytes of memory and an iPod Touch with 32 gigabytes of memory. This sets the stage for the price cuts later this year.
lead_paragraph: Steve Jobs didn’t assemble the multitudes to announce iPhone and iTouch models with more memory. A simple news release is all he needs to get attention.
